code:
class Solution(object):
    def sumCounts(self, nums):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        mod = 10**9 + 7
        ans = 0
        n = len(nums)
        last_index = [-1] * (n + 1)
        contribution = [0] * (n + 1)
        for i in range(n):
            if last_index[nums[i]] != -1:
                contribution[i] = (contribution[last_index[nums[i]]] + (i - last_index[nums[i]]) * (i - last_index[nums[i]] + 1) // 2) % mod
            else:
                contribution[i] = (i + 1) * (i + 2) // 2 % mod
            last_index[nums[i]] = i
            ans = (ans + contribution[i]) % mod
        return ans
